page.title: 11LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: This block has few facilites for Recreation.In the{LAIDLAW MEMORIAL {HALL}there are{Brownies }and a{Youth {Club }once a week,{Carpet Bowling } twice a week in winter,and a monthly meeting of the{Womens Rural Institute. An all-weather bowling green and clubhouse in the village closed in 1984,being financially unviable. The { {JEDFOREST HUNT AND SUPPORTERS}are active in the area,riding once or twice a week in Winter.The village Public House is just outside the block.In Summer there are regular informal Cricket Matches at Tythehouse Farm,and many people travel into the towns where there are more facilities for sport and recreation.Some people owm horses to ride for pleasure and there is an annual "Four-in-Hand" Carriage event at Hobsburn.
